title: AbstractSpatialFieldType tokens should show up in the analysis UI
description: Currently the analysis UI incorrectly shows the input text as the indexed values.  We want it to show the tokens that are indexed.

comments.author: David Smiley
comments.content:
+1 Cool.

Note that the test is out of date since I committed LUCENE-4942 minutes ago in which CellTokenStream was renamed to BytesRefIteratorTokenStream.
